AI Description: TCLAP is a small, flexible library that provides a simple interface for defining and accessing command line arguments. It is a mature, stable, lightweight, and efficient library for parsing command line arguments in C++ programs.
Core Features: Simple & Straightforward Api For Defining & Parsing Command Line Arguments, Support For Short & Long Argument Formats, Ability To Easily Define Arguments With Various Data Types, Automatic Generation Of Help & Usage Information, Cross-Platform Compatibility
General Tags: Command Line Arguments, Parsing, C++, Library
